sentence: MSNBC host Cori Coffin asked the GOP strategist about the "warm welcome" that North Carolina Republican Representative Madison Cawthorn received during Trump's Saturday rally in Selma, North Carolina, and whether or not the congressman is the "future of the GOP."
author: Fatma Khaled
title: Trump Crowds 'Getting Smaller,' Base 'Shrinking,' Says GOP Strategist
